variant.summary: when the mic button is pressed

histogram.name: Assistant.BetterOnboarding.Click
histogram.summary: The number of times Assistant better onboarding buttons are clicked.

histogram.name: Assistant.ButtonClickCount
histogram.summary: The number of times buttons on Assistant UI (e.g., minimize) are clicked.

histogram.name: Assistant.ContextEnabledUserCount
histogram.summary: Among eligible users, whether the user has the Assistant context (related info) enabled. Recorded once for every UMA upload. The set of eligible users includes all users with profiles that can allow Assistant service to be enabled (AssistantAllowedState is limited by locale, policy, etc).

histogram.name: Assistant.DspHotwordDetection
histogram.summary: Counts the number of times Dsp hotword gets detected in each status, to help capture the hotword false acceptance rate.

histogram.name: Assistant.EntryPoint
histogram.summary: Record the Assistant entry point where Assistant UI becomes visible. ChromeOS only.

histogram.name: Assistant.ExitPoint
histogram.summary: Record the Assistant exit point where Assistant UI becomes invisible. ChromeOS only.

histogram.name: Assistant.HotwordEnableNotification
histogram.summary: Counts the number of times user click the hotword enable notification to open Assistant settings.

histogram.name: Assistant.Interaction.Resolution
histogram.summary: Record the Assistant interaction resolution code. It indicates how the Assistant server interpreted a particular query and decision on the state, e.g. if the conversation is normal or timed out or ended with other errors.

histogram.name: Assistant.Libassistant.DlcInstallResult
histogram.summary: The result of an attempt to install the libassistant DLC package. Emitted when the Assistant service installs the DLC.

histogram.name: Assistant.Libassistant.DlcLoadStatus
histogram.summary: Records if the libassistant DLC is loaded successfully. Emitted when the libassistant service initializes.

histogram.name: Assistant.OptInFlow.GetSettingsRequestTime
histogram.summary: Amount of time between get settings request and response. The request will be sent for each time the Assistant OptIn Flow is triggered to get string texts from the server.

histogram.name: Assistant.OptInFlow.LoadingTimeoutCount
histogram.summary: Number of times that the loading timeout triggers. The loading timeout is set by the Assistant OptIn Flow loading screen, which shows up during the server string texts and webviews are pending.

histogram.name: Assistant.OptInFlowStatus
histogram.summary: Record the status of the Assistant opt-in flow.

histogram.name: Assistant.QueryCountPerEntryPoint
histogram.summary: Number of queries fired for each entry point.

histogram.name: Assistant.QueryResponseType
histogram.summary: The Assistant query response type.

histogram.name: Assistant.QuerySource
histogram.summary: The source of Assistant query (e.g. dialog plate text field, voice input). Recorded when the query is committed.

histogram.name: Assistant.ServiceEnabledUserCount
histogram.summary: Among eligible users, whether the user has the Assistant service enabled. Recorded once for every UMA upload. The set of eligible users includes all users with profiles that can allow Assistant service to be enabled (AssistantAllowedState is limited by locale, policy, etc).

histogram.name: Assistant.ServiceReadyTime
histogram.summary: Amount of time between when the Assistant service is launched, and when the Assistant back-end signals it is ready to process queries.

histogram.name: Assistant.ServiceStartTime
histogram.summary: Amount of time spent in starting Assistant service.

histogram.name: Assistant.ServiceState
histogram.summary: Records the number of Assistant manager service in each state, to help capture the service failure rate. Recorded when the service state changes.

histogram.name: Assistant.SetDspHotwordLocale
histogram.summary: For each attempt to set the hotword locale for a DSP device, counts whether the attempt succeeded.
